definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
unit (forming an entity)/element/(in a residential building) entrance or staircase

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能開一張不可撤消的跟單信用證嗎？

sentences.english: How do I submit an expense report?
On the third floor they are selling linens.
What advice do you have for anyone looking to start a collection of single malts ?
sentences.chinese: 你對那些想開始收藏單麥芽威士忌的人有何建議？

sentences.english: The bladder is thin-walled and closed by a one-way valve.
sentences.chinese: 浮囊具有薄壁的結構並且通過單方向的閥門關閉。

sentences.english: Helium is a monatomic chemically inert gas.
Scientists believe it is a main source of the G ring and its single ring arc.
sentences.chinese: 科學家認爲，它是一個主要來源國和它的單環環弧。

sentences.english: Stationary anode, single focus, and bridge silicon rectification, The X-ray generator is an oil-immersed self-cooled unit.
sentences.chinese: 固定陽極，單焦點，橋式硅整流，油浸自冷組合式。

sentences.english: Space is at a premium in a one-bedroomed apartment.
sentences.chinese: 單居室公寓的空間是很有限的。

sentences.english: The song is from Goodnight & Go single.
sentences.chinese: 這首歌曲是從晚安轉到單。

sentences.english: In single-dispatch polymorphism, the object that "owns" a method is singled out.
sentences.chinese: 在單分派多態性中，挑選出“擁有”方法的對象。

sentences.english: This article introduces the methods of checking integrate circuit module and single crystal transistor.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了用萬用表檢測集成電路塊和單結晶體管的方法。

sentences.english: This kind of single-lung fish can live up to 12 hours when out of water.
sentences.chinese: 這種單肺魚離開水面能生存多達12小時。

sentences.english: The most common type of fuel pump is the single-action, diaphragm-type mechanical pump.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的燃油泵是單膜片機械式的。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種單波長單光束真彩色彩虹全息圖製作技術。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種單波長單光束真彩色彩虹全息圖製作技術。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
